text: 12|43|(orikkal) rajav parannu: taticcukealutta el pasukkale el melinna pasukkal tinnunnatayi nan svapnam kanunnu. el paccakkatirukalum, el unanniya katirukalum nan kanunnu. he, pradhanikale, ninnal svapnattin vyakhyanam nalkunnavaranenkil enre i svapnattinre karyattil ninnalenikk vidhi parannutaru
